title: Ticket #3660: Add owner-ID as filter to DescribeInstances call
description:
By default, EC2 doesn't include other users when answering a DescribeInstances query; however, OpenStack does. This incurs a great deal of unnecessary overhead, particularly on the OpenStack controller. HTCondor would be a better and more efficient netizen if it included the owner-ID filter.

This owner-ID has nothing do with the HTCondor concept of a job's 'owner', and may require the submitter to include more information -- the access key ID is not the owner ID.
remarks:
2013-Jun-06 16:18:07 by tlmiller:
This is a low priority for Tony Tiradani at the moment because, in his configuration, all VMs are started by the same user.
